scripts.deploy: node manifestGenerator.js && git commit -am "Updated manifest" && git push
scripts.devtomaster: git checkout master && git merge --no-ff --no-commit dev & git reset HEAD module.json && git checkout -- module.json && git commit -m "Merge branch 'dev' into master"
scripts.mastertodev: git checkout dev && git pull . master --no-commit & git reset HEAD manifest.json && git checkout -- manifest.json && git commit -m "Merge branch master into dev"
